subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt of Jamaica pulled away from the pack Saturday at the London Grand Prix, winning the 200 meters in 19.76 seconds. Bolt, who holds the world record in the 100, got a fast start and led for about the final 100 meters, winning by a half-second despite easing up at the end.
